title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta and toss.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spice blend for 30 minutes.
Heat butter in a large pan and cook marinated chicken until done. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onion until soft, then add garlic and ginger.
Add remaining spice blend and cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and return chicken to the pan.
Simmer for 5 more minutes and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh vegetables, and tangy salsa.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as directed on packet.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, onions, and sour cream.
Serve immediately with salsa on the side.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and classic Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Make dressing: mash garlic and anchovies into a paste.
Whisk in lemon juice, egg yolk, and Dijon mustard.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking continuously.
Season with black pepper.
Toss lettuce with dressing until well coated.
Top with Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Cream butter and both sugars in a large bowl.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in flour mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection with herbs and lemon.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, garlic, dill, and parsley.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Brush salmon with herb mixture.
Grill salmon for 4-6 minutes per side, depending on thickness.
Fish is done when it flakes easily with a fork.
Remove from grill and let rest for 2 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges and remaining herb mixture.
